entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
